name: Remix Puzzle Game
description:
This was assisted with the form of using unique features, is not only a wonderful game, but also a work full of creative and inspiration.

The game presents a fairy tale wonder world with using the style of American scribble. The way of playing the game is also creative, it creates all kinds of objects by entering the words, then to help the hero to pass one and one levels.

Do you think it is just a simple word puzzel game? You're wrong. This is also a extremely high degree of freedom's plot game which you could experience the character's funny life in the game.

The game is to experience Edward’s funny life by the way of solving the puzzles, hope you could get the wonderful feeling during the game. Come and join it quickly!
